title: The Wedding Murders : Episode 27
description: It was July 1980 and the Olympic Games were beginning in Moscow.  In Brentwood, Essex it was an uneventful Thursday evening for a recently married young couple until a horrifying sequence of events resulted in their brutal deaths.  In this episode of the weekly UK True Crime podcast we examine the events leading up to their murder.
